briefDescription: The 2018 BMW M5 has a range of special features and trims that make it arguably one of the best cars in the market. One of my dream cars and some of these specs, especially for a production 4 door car, should blow your mind!
carSpecs: 4.4L twin-turbo DOHC 32-valve V-8/600 hp @ 6,600 rpm and 553 lb-ft @5,700 rpm
carFacts: Customers can opt for the M Driver's package which allows drivers to take car from 250 km/h to 305 km/h

briefDescription: The 2021 BMW M3 may have an ugly grill, but that doesn't mean she isn't mean on the track!
carSpecs: 8 speed automatic transmission or 6 speed manual :)
carFacts: One of the few BMWs to come with a manual option
